channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Toy company challenges Trump’s tariffs before the Supreme Court in long shot bid for quick decision
item.description: An Illinois toy company is challenging Donald Trump’s tariffs at the Supreme Court. Learning Resources Inc. filed an appeal asking the Supreme Court to take up the case soon rather than let it continue to play out in lower courts.

item.title: How a weekend of chaos unfolded in the Minnesota shootings
Minnesota shooting suspect had dozens of potential targets, prosecutors say
